aboutSection.title: About Sparkle Home Cleaning
aboutSection.subtitle: Your trusted cleaning partner in Scottsdale
aboutSection.description:
Sparkle Home Cleaning was founded in 2018 with a simple mission: provide honest, thorough cleaning services that Scottsdale families can count on.
What started as a one-person operation has grown into a team of 15+ professional cleaners. But even as we've grown, we've never lost sight of what matters most—treating every home with care and respect.
aboutSection.mission: To make every Scottsdale home a healthier, happier place to live.

values.title: Customer First
values.description: Every decision starts with what's best for our customers and their families.

values.title: Quality Work
values.description: We never cut corners. Every job done right, guaranteed.

values.title: Eco-Friendly
values.description: Green Seal Certified products that are safe for kids, pets, and the planet.

blogSection.title: Tips & Insights
blogSection.subtitle: Expert cleaning advice and home care tips from our team

services.heroSubtitle: From weekly maintenance to deep cleans, we've got you covered

about.heroSubtitle: For 8 years, Sparkle Home Cleaning has been making Scottsdale homes shine. We treat every home like our own.
storyParagraphs: Sparkle Home Cleaning was founded in 2018 with a simple mission: provide honest, thorough cleaning services that Scottsdale families can count on.

What started as a one-person operation has grown into a team of 15+ professional cleaners. But even as we've grown, we've never lost sight of what matters most—treating every home with care and respect.
Today, we're proud to serve hundreds of Scottsdale families with eco-friendly cleaning that's safe for kids, pets, and the planet.

contact.heroSubtitle: Ready to book a cleaning or have questions? We're here to help. Call us or fill out the form below.
contact.formSubtitle: Tell us about your space and we'll provide a customized quote.
contact.emergencyText: For urgent cleaning needs, please call us directly and we'll do our best to accommodate you.

areas.heroSubtitle: Professional cleaning services throughout the Valley. We proudly serve Scottsdale and surrounding communities.
